languages.text: "Десятина — уловка. Губернатор прекрасно понимает, что каждый час, что он не предоставляет отчет, становится гвоздем в крышку его гроба. Значит, он и не пытается отчитаться за недостачу. Полагаю, для некой цели ему важно, чтобы мы оставались на Тассере".

"The tithe is a ruse. The governor is fully aware that with every hour that passes without him providing a report, his sentence only becomes more severe. Which means he is not even trying to account for the shortage. I suspect that there is some goal he is pursuing in trying to keep us here on Thassera."
languages.original_text: "Десятина — уловка. Губернатор прекрасно понимает, что каждый час, что он не предоставляет отчет, становится гвоздем в крышку его гроба. Значит, он и не пытается отчитаться за недостачу. Полагаю, для некой цели ему важно, чтобы мы оставались на Тассере".

Which means he is not even trying to account for the shortage. I suspect that there is some goal he is pursuing in trying to keep us here on Thassera."

"The tithe is a trick. The governor is fully aware that with every hour that passes without him providing a report, his sentence only becomes more severe. Which means he is not even trying to give an account of the shortage. I suspect that there is some goal he is pursuing in trying to keep us here on Thassera."

"The tithe is a ruse. The governor is fully aware that with every hour that passes without him providing a report, his sentence only becomes more severe. Which means he is not even trying to account for the shortage. I suspect that there is some goal he is pursuing in trying to keep us here on Thassera."

Which means he is not even trying to account for the shortage. I suspect that there is some goal he is pursuing in trying to keep us here on Thassera."

"The tithe is a ruse. The governor is fully aware that with every hour that passes without him providing a report, his sentence only becomes more severe. Which means he is not even trying to account for the shortage. I suspect that there is some goal he is pursuing in trying to keep us here on Thassera."

"The tithe is a ruse. The governor is fully aware that with every hour that passes without him providing a report, his sentence only becomes more severe. Which means he is not even trying to account for the shortage. I suspect that there is some goal he is pursuing in trying to keep us here on Thassera."

languages.text: “所谓的什一税只是个幌子。那个总督很清楚，他的什一税报告到现在还没交上来。每拖一个小时，他的刑期就会变得更长一分，可他甚至都没打算解释什一税短缺的原因。我怀疑，出于某种目的，他打算把我们留在塔瑟拉。”
languages.original_text: "The tithe is a ruse. The governor is fully aware that with every hour that passes without him providing a report, his sentence only becomes more severe. Which means he is not even trying to account for the shortage. I suspect that there is some goal he is pursuing in trying to keep us here on Thassera."

traits.locale_text: “所谓的什一税只是个幌子。那个总督很清楚，他的什一税报告到现在还没交上来。每拖一个小时，他的刑期就会变得更长一分，可他甚至都没打算解释什一税短缺的原因。我怀疑，出于某种目的，他打算把我们留在塔瑟拉。”

languages.text: 「租税は策略だ。総督は報告を提出しない期間が長いほど、自身への刑が重くなることを十分承知している。つまり、彼は足りない分の説明をするつもりすらない。彼が我々をタッセーラに留めようとしているのは何らかの目的があると疑っている」
languages.original_text: "The tithe is a ruse. The governor is fully aware that with every hour that passes without him providing a report, his sentence only becomes more severe. Which means he is not even trying to account for the shortage. I suspect that there is some goal he is pursuing in trying to keep us here on Thassera."

traits.locale_text: 「租税は策略だ。総督は報告を提出しない期間が長いほど、自身への刑が重くなることを十分承知している。つまり、彼は足りない分の説明をするつもりすらない。彼が我々をタッセーラに留めようとしているのは何らかの目的があると疑っている」

languages.text: «El diezmo es un engaño. El gobernador es plenamente consciente de que a cada hora que pasa sin darnos un informe, su sentencia se vuelve más severa, lo que significa que no está intentando dar cuenta de la escasez. Sospecho que tiene otro objetivo en mente para mantenernos aquí, en Thassera».
languages.original_text: "The tithe is a ruse. The governor is fully aware that with every hour that passes without him providing a report, his sentence only becomes more severe. Which means he is not even trying to account for the shortage. I suspect that there is some goal he is pursuing in trying to keep us here on Thassera."

traits.locale_text: «El diezmo es un engaño. El gobernador es plenamente consciente de que a cada hora que pasa sin darnos un informe, su sentencia se vuelve más severa, lo que significa que no está intentando dar cuenta de la escasez. Sospecho que tiene otro objetivo en mente para mantenernos aquí, en Thassera».

languages.text: "Der Zehnt ist ein Kniff. Der Gouverneur weiß genau, dass seine Strafe mit jeder Stunde ohne seinen Bericht schwerer wird. Und das bedeutet, dass er nicht einmal versucht, die Fehlmenge auszugleichen. Ich vermute, dass er mit dem Versuch, uns hier auf Thassera zu halten, ein bestimmtes Ziel verfolgt."
languages.original_text: "The tithe is a ruse. The governor is fully aware that with every hour that passes without him providing a report, his sentence only becomes more severe. Which means he is not even trying to account for the shortage. I suspect that there is some goal he is pursuing in trying to keep us here on Thassera."

traits.locale_text: "Der Zehnt ist ein Kniff. Der Gouverneur weiß genau, dass seine Strafe mit jeder Stunde ohne seinen Bericht schwerer wird. Und das bedeutet, dass er nicht einmal versucht, die Fehlmenge auszugleichen. Ich vermute, dass er mit dem Versuch, uns hier auf Thassera zu halten, ein bestimmtes Ziel verfolgt."

languages.text: "Aşar denen şey, üçkâğıttan ibaret. Vali, rapor sunmadığı her saat başına çekeceği cezanın daha da ağırlaşacağının gayet farkında. Bu da bize kendisinin eksikliği açıklamak gibi bir niyetinin olmadığını gösteriyor. Bizi Thassera'da tutmaya çalışmasının ardında gizli bir amaç yattığını düşünüyorum."
languages.original_text: "The tithe is a ruse. The governor is fully aware that with every hour that passes without him providing a report, his sentence only becomes more severe. Which means he is not even trying to account for the shortage. I suspect that there is some goal he is pursuing in trying to keep us here on Thassera."

traits.locale_text: "Aşar denen şey üçkâğıttan ibaret. Vali, rapor sunmadığı her saat başına çekeceği cezanın daha da ağırlaşacağının gayet farkında. Bu da bize kendisinin eksikliği açıklamak gibi bir niyetinin olmadığını gösteriyor. Bizi Thassera'da tutmaya çalışmasının ardında gizli bir amaç yattığını düşünüyorum."

languages.text: « La dîme est un subterfuge. Le gouverneur sait pertinemment que chaque heure qui passe sans qu'il fasse son rapport ne fait qu'aggraver le châtiment qui lui pend au nez. Or, il n'essaie même pas de justifier le manque à gagner. Je le soupçonne de chercher à nous garder sur Thassera à quelque fin obscure. »
languages.original_text: "The tithe is a ruse. The governor is fully aware that with every hour that passes without him providing a report, his sentence only becomes more severe. Which means he is not even trying to account for the shortage. I suspect that there is some goal he is pursuing in trying to keep us here on Thassera."

traits.locale_text: « La dîme est un subterfuge. Le gouverneur sait pertinemment que chaque heure qui passe sans qu'il fasse son rapport ne fait qu'aggraver le châtiment qui lui pend au nez. Or, il n'essaie même pas de justifier le manque à gagner. Je le soupçonne de chercher à nous garder sur Thassera à quelque fin obscure. »
